titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: Patterson ordered me to keep to my room, & there I stayed all day very wretchedly. I
wrote to poor Lady Limerick condoling with her on the deaths of both her children
â€“ the boy at the Front, the girl through influenza in America.
